Clinical
Concept - reference to a terminology or just text
Cardinality: 1..1
CodeableConcept
 A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

 value must be a Codeable Concept (IPS)
value is bound to Condition Clinical Status Codes (7 codes)
Concept - reference to a terminology or just text
Cardinality: 1..1
CodeableConcept
 A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

 value must be a Codeable Concept (IPS)
value is bound to ConditionVerificationStatus. Codes:
  • ConditionVerificationStatus: unconfirmed "Unconfirmed"
  • ConditionVerificationStatus: provisional "Provisional"
  • ConditionVerificationStatus: differential "Differential"
  • ConditionVerificationStatus: confirmed "Confirmed"
  • ConditionVerificationStatus: refuted "Refuted"
  • ConditionVerificationStatus: entered-in-error "Entered in Error"
Concept - reference to a terminology or just text
Cardinality: 0..1
CodeableConcept
 A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

 value must be a Codeable Concept (IPS)
value is bound to Condition/Diagnosis Severity. Codes:
  • SNOMED CT: 24484000 "Severe"
  • SNOMED CT: 6736007 "Midgrade"
  • SNOMED CT: 255604002 "Mild"

codinghas cardinality: 0..1
Estimated or actual date, date-time, or age
Cardinality: 0..1
dateTime
 Estimated or actual date or date-time the condition began, in the opinion of the clinician.
Other Data.
Age at Diagnosis
Cardinality: 0..1
Extension
 ERDRI-CDS - The age at which the condition was diagnosed.

 value must be a Age at Diagnosis
Age at Onset
Cardinality: 0..1
Extension
 ERDRI-CDS - The age at which the condition first appeared.

 value must be a Age at Onset
Who has the condition?
Cardinality: 1..1
Reference
 Indicates the patient or group who the condition record is associated with.

 value must point to a RareLink IPS Patient
referencehas cardinality: 1..1
